buildCommand: curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.38.7-stable.tar.xz -o flutter.tar.xz && tar -xf flutter.tar.xz && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter --version && flutter build web --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --dart-define=SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
